meanings.definition: To send (a package or letter) using the FedEx delivery service.
meanings.sent1: I fedexed the birthday gift to my friend.
meanings.sent2: She always fedexed important documents for work.
meanings.sent3: The cat fedexed a toy mouse to its owner as a surprise.
meanings.sent4: The news of the victory was fedexed to the team, boosting their morale.
meanings.sent5: The urgent medical supplies were fedexed to the disaster area.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I fedexed the contract to the client.
meanings.sent2: They fedexed the package last week, and it arrived on time.
meanings.sent3: The time traveler accidentally fedexed a letter to the past.
meanings.sent4: The secret message was fedexed to the spy in a coded package.
meanings.sent5: The missing keys were fedexed back to the owner by a kind stranger.
